overview: THE OFFICIAL DAK AND DON MOVIE IS HERE.  Brad, a gangly young hero, navigates the complicated dating world in suburbia. He’s an expert basketball player who finds himself in a love triangle with Courtney Cox (not that one) and Heidi, the new girl to the local trampoline. This short film explores the age-old problem of buying donuts for your girlfriend with a time jumping story à la Pulp Fiction and needle drops that rival Martin Scorsese.
tagline: The official Dak and Don Movie is here
title: The Dak and Don Movie
